issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description: https://travis-ci.org/ursa-labs/crossbow/builds/580192384. Error is due to use of {{std::regex}}; replace with RE2.
fields.summary: [CI][Crossbow] Nightly Gandiva jar trusty job fails

comments.body: [~npr]We fixed this yesterday, will monitor tonight's job and close this when this passes

the build is failing again

[https://travis-ci.org/ursa-labs/crossbow/builds/582833123]

with this commit [https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/d6bc0b6f5975304367000e3090e09d4cf8af1fb9]
the build is failing again. This time because of std::regex usage in arrow dataset.
[~pprudhvi] I think this is resolved by https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6137 , could you confirm?
yes, we can close this ticket. Thanks.
